task:
Attached is a mouse ovary spatial transcriptomics dataset with cell type annotations. What are the top 20 differentially expressed genes in Atretic follicle mural granulosa cells compared to other follicle types (Antral, Preantral)? Subset to mural granulosa cells from Immature ovary samples only using the 'granulosa_celltypes_reduced' and 'Sample' columns. Exclude ribosomal genes (Rps*, Rpl*, Mrp*) from results.

Return JSON: {"top_marker_genes": ["..."]}
notes: Atretic follicle mural granulosa signature: stress response genes (Nupr1, Gm26917), apoptosis regulators (Npm1, Tpt1), and lipid metabolism (Apoe). These markers reflect follicle degeneration and cellular stress in atretic follicles.
